issue.title: [Rust] Add an adapter for parquet.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3085](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3085). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3085?focusedCommentId=16589665) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
`[~liurenjie1024]` I have code in <https://github.com/datafusion-rs/datafusion> that loads parquet files into arrow memory. That may be useful at least as a reference. I'm also happy to donate any of this code to the arrow project (or to the parquet-rs project).

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3085?focusedCommentId=16993767) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
`[~andygrove]` `[~liurenjie1024]`  can we close this as implemented?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3085?focusedCommentId=16994054) by Renjie Liu (liurenjie1024):*
Yes, I think so.
